website_summaries.verdict: A good option to consider if you want a larger 10-inch subwoofer to deliver better dynamics and volume.
pros: Comes with a single mono amplifier
Eliminates the need for extra equipment other than a stereo or external sound source
RCA speaker-level inputs and vented voice coil
Includes the necessary mounting hardware and fasteners
cons: 200-watt maximum power rating is low for a 10-inch subwoofer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Match!
customer_reviews.text: This was the best investment I made in my boat to date. On my 20' Regal I have six 6 1/2" Kenwood speakers driven off of the internal amp (front 2) and the mid and rears driven off of a 400 Watt 4 channel amp. Sound was loud and clean but it was missing something. This is the perfect complement to any good system without a sub. Look to make use of the storage space under seats as the bass cabinet. It was a bit unnerving cutting into the boat but take your time, measure three times and go slow.
customer_reviews.author: CaptnDanLKW

customer_reviews.title: Great price for great bass sound
customer_reviews.text: Great amp and subwoofer combo , the amp that comes with this package it’s actually a 2 channel amp so you can add a subwoofer to it , that one subwoofer did an amazing job playing low frequencies, I was really amazed since it is for free air applications
customer_reviews.author: george p

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: This sub sounds good and the more it breaks in the better it sounds! great addition to you system and great package deal
customer_reviews.author: Darren G.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Easy to install. Wonderful for our boat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A smoking deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing deal! I just installed it tonight and it sounds great! I had just installed a new Kenwood head unit, which can adjust the volume of the subwoofer, otherwise it might be too loud. It rocks my 26’ boat like a much more expensive unit.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Sillars

customer_reviews.title: Kenwood eqpt is A-OK
customer_reviews.text: This thing rocks! 24' pontoon with a Kenwood stereo and JBL 6x9's and I'm happy. The install was quick, easy and this thing works really well with my new Kenwood receiver. Cust service was also great. You won't be sorry to buy Kenwood stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Green

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speakers. In fact
customer_reviews.text: Excellent speakers. In fact, I had ordered a subwoofer to go with them, but when I heard them, I cancelled the subwoofer as the bass is really good. The blew away the factory installed SeaRay speakers in my boat.
customer_reviews.author: k d nyegaard

customer_reviews.title: Great Bass for the money
customer_reviews.text: Installs easily. Isn't going to rattle your innards but gives a good bass hit to your boats factory system. I've used it all summer without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Big G

customer_reviews.title: Good sub
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in my boat. Easy to install and sounds great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kirk Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice setup. Amp was DOA but they allowed return without issue
customer_reviews.author: EDGYVETTE LLC

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the tiny wiring harness fool you. Sounds great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Maverick Boyer

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of volume
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great on my 35' express. Plenty of volume! Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: At times I think it's too much but I love the Bass too much to turn it off
customer_reviews.text: This thig rocks!! At times I think it's too much but I love the Bass too much to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great package ane EASY install
customer_reviews.text: excellent sound i or out of box. very stable. not cutting out. runs 1.5 OHMS which is strange. great pair!
customer_reviews.author: wstrachan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sub sounds great! Amp stays nice and cool no issues of getting hot.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Great subwoofer!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little subwoofer! I was a little hesitant to purchase based on some of the reviews but glad I went ahead with it. This thing really puts out the bass. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Guest

customer_reviews.title: sounds pretty good
customer_reviews.text: I wish it had a gain control on the amp, but for the money it added a lot of good sound to my 19' center console.
customer_reviews.author: jeff swearingen

customer_reviews.title: Hope it at least sounds good when I figure out how to wire it
customer_reviews.text: I have not gotten to the point of even hearing the sub yet. There are no instructions on how to wire the sub to the amp. I'm guessing your supposed to wire the two inputs on the amp in series? No wiring kit included even though one of the answers in the questions section implies that wires are included. Hope it at least sounds good when I figure out how to wire it!
customer_reviews.author: Craig Capizzi

customer_reviews.title: sounds good for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast.... sounds good for what it is. Do not expect to rattle the boats next to you but its good quality sound. I put it in a single sub box and slid it under the drivers console.
customer_reviews.author: motorman

customer_reviews.title: Added the needed punch
customer_reviews.text: This is a lower powered sub and the price reflects it. It adds a nice little kick to the music. It is not too hard to over do it though, you can make the speaker distort if too much signal is sent to it. Overall, for the price it makes the music in the boat much better and fuller.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Brasby

customer_reviews.title: Kenwood subwoofer & amp.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Kenwood system for a friend to put in his boat. He was very pleased with this system.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Putz

customer_reviews.title: Feel The Bass!!!
customer_reviews.text: So if you put the amp very close...like 12 inchs from the battery you probably don’t need a amp kit. Anything longer you either get wires to extend them or just buy an amp kit. Bass is perfect for my 4 speaker installed boat. Adds just enough deep bass for it to shake the console. Better tighten up my screws!! Good Buy
customer_reviews.author: Eric D

customer_reviews.title: It makes sound.
customer_reviews.text: It may be that I do not play the music (classic rock) that makes use of a sub-woofer because I can never get it to sound perfect. I like to have the range at a higher frequency which works well with some music but not others. I have to constantly readjust the sub woofer volume. I don't have a lot of experience with sub-woofers so I really have nothing to compare it to.
customer_reviews.author: Michele G

customer_reviews.title: Crazy sub package for the money!!
customer_reviews.text: This sub will litterly rock your boat. In hind sight I should have gotten an 8". Not wanting to cut a 10" hole in my counsel, I opted to get a box for the sub and place it under the dash. Dang, it is so loud and powerfully, I have the set the sub at -6 to keep it from rattling everything on the boat! Way better than I expected for the money!
customer_reviews.author: BOBBERMAN2

customer_reviews.title: Loud clear bass.
customer_reviews.text: Great sub, this unit will shake and rattle your boat. I had to turn down the bass on my phone since I matched this up with a bluetooth speaker system. Only thing it is missing is a switch to manually control the amount of bass. Overall, very pleased with the sound and battery draw on my system.
customer_reviews.author: Jason H.

customer_reviews.title: For the price so worth it
customer_reviews.text: Changed my boat life for so cheap. Waited 3 months to write a review. Still going strong!!!
customer_reviews.author: Hollywood

customer_reviews.title: believe it!
customer_reviews.text: The Sub and amp great performance. very loud for only 200 watt amp. Sub feels and look like great product.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: This system enhanced the factory full-range speakers on my boat ...
customer_reviews.text: This system enhanced the factory full-range speakers on my boat and added just enough low end to make a huge difference. It actually has more volume than I could ever use - keep in mind that you will need a head unit that has a built in sub crossover/level adjustment or you will need to install some other sort of system to keep the volume in check. Installed under a set of seats in a semi-sealed enclosure and it definitely has some kick.
customer_reviews.author: Techie To The Nines

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and value, second time purchase
customer_reviews.text: bought for old boat and new. great sound, look, value and quality.
customer_reviews.author: Berlin's

customer_reviews.title: Great unit for great price
customer_reviews.text: Great unit for great price. 4/5 stars due to crappy stock wiring. Had to use upgraded wiring in a marine application to avoid/prolong onset of imminent weak-wire problems. Sound is great.
customer_reviews.author: SnackLover

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product but did not come with any wire or ends for speaker
customer_reviews.author: JEFF WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my 19ft Regal. Easy install great sound for the price
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Great for our 19 foot boat
customer_reviews.text: This was a spur of the moment purchase looking for additional birthday present for my husband. It is just enough to boost the sound and add some bass on our 19 foot boat. Since we have not upgraded our speakers yet, i actually have to turn the bass down some. I am glad we made this purchase and I didnt try to buy the most expensive option. This is a great fit.
customer_reviews.author: ADees

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I recently added this system to my Polaris Rzr and all I can say is wow this thing is just what I needed to add some bass now it's not going to rattle your ears but it is good quality bass that doesn't hurt the wallet too bad now I have 2 JL speakers with this sub and my system is jamming.
customer_reviews.author: joe scott

customer_reviews.title: True bass with no distortion
customer_reviews.text: Installed this subwoofer into front of helm on pontoon boat. Before application sound was lost probably due to the large open areas of the pontoon. After installation the speaker's sound significantly incresed their clarity and pitch and the subwwoofer takes on easily the different rythms of all ranges of music from easy listening to heavy metal. We love this unit!
customer_reviews.author: Bettye

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable performance for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Considering the price, I didn't have high expectations but I was pleasantly surprised. I installed it in a 18' fiberglass bowrider and it literally shakes boat! This would have been a good deal at twice the price!
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of bass.
customer_reviews.text: Installed in a 19' boat. Sounds great even at 40 mph. Installation straight forward and pretty easy. Used with Kenwood marine receiver.
customer_reviews.author: Paul F. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nice little matched system performs well
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I need for my 19ft bowrider. Nice little matched system performs well.
customer_reviews.author: Shorthairs

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adding a 2nd one to my boat great little sub
customer_reviews.author: Bill

product_meta.title: Kenwood P-WD250MRW 10-Inch Marine Subwoofer and Amplifier Package
product_meta.description: Product Packaging:Frustration-Free PackagingPrepare for adventure on the open water with a 10" Marine Subwoofer & Amp Package. Including a mono amp & a 10" subwoofer with dual voice coils, this package features RCA speaker-level inputs and vented voice coil. The conformal-coated PCB and 200W peak power provide users with a reliable listening experience.
feature_bullets: Package includes KFC-W250MRW marine subwoofer and KAC-201MR amplifier
Pearl mica polypropylene woofer with rubber surround

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars80 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
